quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: “There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.”

quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe
quotes.quote: “Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.”

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: “Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.”

quotes.author: André Gide
quotes.quote: “It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.”

quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison
quotes.quote: “I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.”

quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.quote: “A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water.”

quotes.author: Steve Martin
quotes.quote: “A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.”

quotes.author: Irina
quotes.quote: quote

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: “The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.”

quotes.author: J.K. Rowling
quotes.quote: “It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.”

quotes.quote: “The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid.”
